title: FS: 1887 N172 Old Judge Comiskey "Brown's Champions" SOLD!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 N172 Old Judge Comiskey "Brown's Champions" SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Terrific looking card, and up for grabs today.  Hate to see it go, but I'm getting close to finishing another project that has reached my top priority list, so I'm going for it!  :)

SOLD!
Nice card, Jimi. Best of luck with the sale.
